ID: CYKT2EW_00

CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-01 18:33
Subject: Welcome to your Smartcare by Cigna Plan
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

 <https://ntouch.nnhs.ae/nntfiles/myApp/EmailTemplates/Cigna/banner-sc.jpg> 	
	
	Dear HAGOP,

Welcome to the Cigna Healthcare family. Your health insurance plan is administered by Neuron, a strategic partner of Cigna Healthcare.

At Cigna Healthcare, we make it our mission to improve the health and vitality of those we serve. No matter where you are in the world, we’re with you.

Enclosed in this email are important details and documents in relation to your health insurance plan. Please review your personal information below and reach out to us on 800-SMARTCARE in case of any inaccuracies.

chunks.text:
Enclosed in this email are important details and documents in relation to your health insurance plan. Please review your personal information below and reach out to us on 800-SMARTCARE in case of any inaccuracies.

In line with our digital proposition, a digital copy of your membership card is attached in this email. To safeguard your information, a unique 8-digit password is required to open the attached documents. For your convenience, we have set your date of birth as this password in the "DDMMYYYY" format. Do not include any space or special characters, while inserting your password. This will allow you cardless access to care at all providers within your network. The digital ID card is also available through the SmartCare by Cigna app

Alternatively, you can also use your Emirates ID, registered with Cigna Healthcare.

	
	
	Personal details	 
First Name:	 
Last Name:	 
Policy Holder:	 
Neuron ID:	 
  	 
HAGOP	 
GHAZARIAN	 
M.C.T. FZE	 
52SC40898040975	 
	
	
	
	You can also download the following items for more details:

	
 <https://ntouch.nnhs.ae/nntfiles/myApp/EmailTemplates/Cigna/sc-body.jpg> 	
	
 <https://ntouch.nnhs.ae/nntfiles/myApp/EmailTemplates/Cigna/steps.png> 	
In case you face any problems during registration, or have any questions about your plan, you can email us on smartcare.support@neuron.ae <mailto:smartcare.support@neuron.ae>  or call us on 800-SMARTCARE.

Regards, 
Cigna Healthcare
